name: SOAP 1.1 Basic Operation - Single GetUser
description: Demonstrates basic SOAP 1.1 request/response with SOAPAction header matching

name: SOAP 1.1 Multiple Operations - User CRUD Service
description: Demonstrates multiple SOAP operations in a single endpoint with different SOAPAction values

name: SOAP Operation Matching by Element Name
description: Demonstrates operation matching by XML element name when no SOAPAction is provided

name: SOAP with Inline WSDL - Order Service
description: Demonstrates WSDL serving with inline WSDL definition accessible via ?wsdl query parameter

soap.wsdl: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><definitions name="OrderService" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://example.com/orderservice" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://example.com/orderservice"><types><xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://example.com/orderservice"><xsd:element name="GetOrderRequest"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="orderId" type="xsd:string"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType></xsd:element><xsd:element name="GetOrderResponse"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="orderId" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="status" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="total" type="xsd:decimal"/><xsd:element name="currency" type="xsd:string"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType></xsd:element><xsd:element name="CreateOrderRequest"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="customerId" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="items" type="tns:OrderItems"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType></xsd:element><xsd:element name="CreateOrderResponse"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="orderId" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="status" type="xsd:string"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType></xsd:element><xsd:complexType name="OrderItems"><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="item" type="tns:OrderItem" maxOccurs="unbounded"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="OrderItem"><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="productId" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="quantity" type="xsd:int"/><xsd:element name="price" type="xsd:decimal"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType></xsd:schema></types><message name="GetOrderRequest"><part name="parameters" element="tns:GetOrderRequest"/></message><message name="GetOrderResponse"><part name="parameters" element="tns:GetOrderResponse"/></message><message name="CreateOrderRequest"><part name="parameters" element="tns:CreateOrderRequest"/></message><message name="CreateOrderResponse"><part name="parameters" element="tns:CreateOrderResponse"/></message><portType name="OrderPortType"><operation name="GetOrder"><input message="tns:GetOrderRequest"/><output message="tns:GetOrderResponse"/></operation><operation name="CreateOrder"><input message="tns:CreateOrderRequest"/><output message="tns:CreateOrderResponse"/></operation></portType><binding name="OrderBinding" type="tns:OrderPortType"><soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/><operation name="GetOrder"><soap:operation soapAction="http://example.com/GetOrder"/></operation><operation name="CreateOrder"><soap:operation soapAction="http://example.com/CreateOrder"/></operation></binding><service name="OrderService"><port name="OrderPort" binding="tns:OrderBinding"><soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/soap/orders"/></port></service></definitions>

name: SOAP 1.1 Client Fault Response
description: Demonstrates SOAP 1.1 fault response for client errors (invalid request)

fault.message: Validation failed: Required field 'customerId' is missing
fault.detail: <validationError xmlns="http://example.com/errors"><field>customerId</field><errorCode>REQUIRED_FIELD_MISSING</errorCode><description>The customerId field is required but was not provided</description></validationError>

name: SOAP 1.1 Server Fault Response
description: Demonstrates SOAP 1.1 fault response for server errors (internal error)

name: SOAP 1.2 Service - Modern Inventory API
description: Demonstrates SOAP 1.2 protocol with action in Content-Type header (application/soap+xml)

name: SOAP 1.2 Fault Response (Sender)
description: Demonstrates SOAP 1.2 fault with Sender code (equivalent to SOAP 1.1 Client fault)

name: SOAP 1.2 Fault Response (Receiver)
description: Demonstrates SOAP 1.2 fault with Receiver code (equivalent to SOAP 1.1 Server fault)

name: SOAP XPath Request Matching - Premium User
description: Demonstrates XPath-based request matching to return different responses based on request content

name: SOAP XPath Request Matching - Standard User
description: Demonstrates XPath-based request matching for standard membership tier

name: SOAP Multiple XPath Conditions
description: Demonstrates matching with multiple XPath conditions that all must be satisfied

name: SOAP XPath Template Variables - Echo Service
description: Demonstrates extracting values from request using XPath and echoing them in response

name: SOAP Nested XPath Extraction
description: Demonstrates extracting deeply nested values from SOAP request using XPath

name: SOAP Response Delay - Slow Service Simulation
description: Demonstrates configuring response delay to simulate slow services

name: SOAP Response Delay - Milliseconds
description: Demonstrates response delay configuration in milliseconds

name: SOAP Complex Types - Shipping Service
description: Demonstrates handling complex nested XML types in request and response

soap.wsdl: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><definitions name="ShippingService" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://example.com/shipping" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://example.com/shipping"><types><xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://example.com/shipping"><xsd:complexType name="Address"><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="street" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="city" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="state" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="zipCode" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="country" type="xsd:string"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="Package"><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="weight" type="xsd:decimal"/><xsd:element name="length" type="xsd:decimal"/><xsd:element name="width" type="xsd:decimal"/><xsd:element name="height" type="xsd:decimal"/><xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType><xsd:complexType name="ShippingRate"><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="carrier" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="service" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="price" type="xsd:decimal"/><xsd:element name="currency" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="estimatedDays" type="xsd:int"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType></xsd:schema></types><message name="CalculateRatesRequest"><part name="origin" type="tns:Address"/><part name="destination" type="tns:Address"/><part name="package" type="tns:Package"/></message><message name="CalculateRatesResponse"><part name="rates" type="tns:ShippingRate"/></message><portType name="ShippingPortType"><operation name="CalculateRates"><input message="tns:CalculateRatesRequest"/><output message="tns:CalculateRatesResponse"/></operation></portType><binding name="ShippingBinding" type="tns:ShippingPortType"><soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/><operation name="CalculateRates"><soap:operation soapAction="http://example.com/shipping/CalculateRates"/></operation></binding><service name="ShippingService"><port name="ShippingPort" binding="tns:ShippingBinding"><soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/soap/shipping"/></port></service></definitions>

TrackShipment.response: <TrackShipmentResponse xmlns="http://example.com/shipping"><trackingNumber>{{xpath://TrackShipment/trackingNumber}}</trackingNumber><status>in_transit</status><events><event><timestamp>2024-12-15T08:00:00Z</timestamp><location>New York, NY</location><status>Package picked up</status></event><event><timestamp>2024-12-15T14:30:00Z</timestamp><location>Newark, NJ</location><status>Arrived at sorting facility</status></event><event><timestamp>2024-12-16T06:00:00Z</timestamp><location>Chicago, IL</location><status>In transit to destination</status></event></events><estimatedDelivery>2024-12-18</estimatedDelivery></TrackShipmentResponse>

name: SOAP Namespace Handling - Prefixed Elements
description: Demonstrates handling namespaced XML elements in requests and responses

name: SOAP Financial Service - Complete Banking API
description: Comprehensive banking API demonstrating multiple operations, complex types, and XPath extraction

soap.wsdl: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><definitions name="BankingService" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://example.com/banking" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://example.com/banking"><types><xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://example.com/banking"><xsd:element name="GetBalanceRequest"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="accountNumber" type="xsd:string"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType></xsd:element><xsd:element name="GetBalanceResponse"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="balance" type="xsd:decimal"/><xsd:element name="availableBalance" type="xsd:decimal"/><xsd:element name="currency" type="xsd:string"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType></xsd:element><xsd:element name="TransferRequest"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="fromAccount" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="toAccount" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="amount" type="xsd:decimal"/><xsd:element name="currency" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="description" type="xsd:string"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType></xsd:element><xsd:element name="TransferResponse"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="transactionId" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="status" type="xsd:string"/><xsd:element name="timestamp" type="xsd:dateTime"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType></xsd:element></xsd:schema></types><portType name="BankingPortType"><operation name="GetBalance"><input message="tns:GetBalanceRequest"/><output message="tns:GetBalanceResponse"/></operation><operation name="Transfer"><input message="tns:TransferRequest"/><output message="tns:TransferResponse"/></operation></portType><binding name="BankingBinding" type="tns:BankingPortType"><soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/></binding><service name="BankingService"><port name="BankingPort" binding="tns:BankingBinding"><soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/soap/banking"/></port></service></definitions>

name: SOAP Healthcare Service - Patient Records
description: Demonstrates SOAP for healthcare with HIPAA-style response structure

ScheduleAppointment.response: <ScheduleAppointmentResponse xmlns="http://example.com/healthcare"><appointmentId>APT-{{uuid}}</appointmentId><patientId>{{xpath://ScheduleAppointment/patientId}}</patientId><providerId>{{xpath://ScheduleAppointment/providerId}}</providerId><appointmentType>{{xpath://ScheduleAppointment/appointmentType}}</appointmentType><scheduledDateTime>{{xpath://ScheduleAppointment/requestedDateTime}}</scheduledDateTime><duration>30</duration><status>confirmed</status><location><facilityName>Main Medical Center</facilityName><address>456 Hospital Blvd, Medical City, CA 90210</address><room>Exam Room 3</room></location><instructions>Please arrive 15 minutes early. Bring insurance card and photo ID.</instructions><confirmationNumber>CONF-{{randomInt:100000:999999}}</confirmationNumber></ScheduleAppointmentResponse>

name: SOAP with Fault and XPath Match - Authorization Error
description: Demonstrates returning fault only when specific XPath conditions match (e.g., invalid token)

fault.message: Token validation failed: The provided token is invalid or expired
fault.detail: <authorizationError xmlns="http://example.com/auth"><errorCode>TOKEN_INVALID</errorCode><tokenProvided>invalid-token</tokenProvided><suggestion>Please obtain a new token using the /auth/login endpoint</suggestion></authorizationError>

name: SOAP Travel Booking Service
description: Complete travel booking API with flight search, booking, and itinerary operations

CancelBooking.response: <CancelBookingResponse xmlns="http://example.com/travel"><bookingReference>{{xpath://CancelBooking/bookingReference}}</bookingReference><status>cancelled</status><cancellationId>CAN-{{uuid}}</cancellationId><cancelledAt>{{now}}</cancelledAt><refund><amount>249.00</amount><currency>USD</currency><method>original_payment_method</method><estimatedProcessingDays>5</estimatedProcessingDays></refund><cancellationPolicy>Full refund applicable for cancellations made 24+ hours before departure.</cancellationPolicy></CancelBookingResponse>

name: SOAP E-Commerce Catalog Service
description: Product catalog API with search, details, and inventory operations

GetProductDetails.response: <GetProductDetailsResponse xmlns="http://example.com/catalog"><product><sku>{{xpath://GetProductDetails/sku}}</sku><name>Wireless Bluetooth Headphones</name><brand>TechSound</brand><description>Premium wireless headphones with 40-hour battery life, active noise cancellation, and crystal-clear audio quality.</description><price>79.99</price><salePrice>59.99</salePrice><currency>USD</currency><specifications><spec name="Battery Life">40 hours</spec><spec name="Bluetooth Version">5.2</spec><spec name="Driver Size">40mm</spec><spec name="Weight">250g</spec><spec name="Noise Cancellation">Active</spec><spec name="Foldable">Yes</spec></specifications><colors><color code="BLK">Black</color><color code="WHT">White</color><color code="NVY">Navy Blue</color></colors><images><image type="main">https://example.com/images/headphones-main.jpg</image><image type="side">https://example.com/images/headphones-side.jpg</image><image type="detail">https://example.com/images/headphones-detail.jpg</image></images><reviews><averageRating>4.5</averageRating><totalReviews>1234</totalReviews><breakdown><stars5>890</stars5><stars4>234</stars4><stars3>78</stars3><stars2>22</stars2><stars1>10</stars1></breakdown></reviews><inStock>true</inStock><stockQuantity>156</stockQuantity><shippingInfo><freeShipping>true</freeShipping><estimatedDelivery>3-5 business days</estimatedDelivery></shippingInfo></product></GetProductDetailsResponse>

name: SOAP Currency Exchange Service

GetHistoricalRates.response: <GetHistoricalRatesResponse xmlns="http://example.com/currency"><baseCurrency>{{xpath://GetHistoricalRates/baseCurrency}}</baseCurrency><quoteCurrency>{{xpath://GetHistoricalRates/quoteCurrency}}</quoteCurrency><period><startDate>{{xpath://GetHistoricalRates/startDate}}</startDate><endDate>{{xpath://GetHistoricalRates/endDate}}</endDate></period><rates><rate date="2024-12-01">1.0521</rate><rate date="2024-12-02">1.0498</rate><rate date="2024-12-03">1.0534</rate><rate date="2024-12-04">1.0612</rate><rate date="2024-12-05">1.0589</rate><rate date="2024-12-06">1.0645</rate><rate date="2024-12-07">1.0678</rate><rate date="2024-12-08">1.0701</rate><rate date="2024-12-09">1.0756</rate><rate date="2024-12-10">1.0847</rate></rates><statistics><high>1.0847</high><low>1.0498</low><average>1.0638</average><volatility>0.0112</volatility></statistics></GetHistoricalRatesResponse>

description: Hotel booking API with availability check, booking, and cancellation

name: SOAP Workflow Service - Approval Process
description: Business workflow API for document approval processes

GetWorkflowStatus.response: <GetWorkflowStatusResponse xmlns="http://example.com/workflow"><workflowId>{{xpath://GetWorkflowStatus/workflowId}}</workflowId><documentId>DOC-12345</documentId><documentTitle>Q4 Budget Proposal</documentTitle><submittedBy>user@example.com</submittedBy><submittedAt>2024-12-15T09:00:00Z</submittedAt><status>in_progress</status><currentStep>2</currentStep><totalSteps>3</totalSteps><history><action timestamp="2024-12-15T09:00:00Z" actor="user@example.com">Submitted for approval</action><action timestamp="2024-12-15T14:30:00Z" actor="manager@example.com">Approved - Step 1 complete</action><action timestamp="2024-12-16T10:00:00Z" actor="system">Notification sent to Step 2 approver</action></history><pendingAction><approver>director@example.com</approver><role>Department Director</role><dueDate>2024-12-19</dueDate><remindersSent>1</remindersSent></pendingAction></GetWorkflowStatusResponse>
